purpose.title: About the Service
purpose.description: Simplify group scheduling. When Are You Free? is a free scheduling tool that lets you visually check everyone's availability, making it easy to find the best time for everyone.

list.0: Schedule by specific dates or recurring days
Invite participants with just a URL

list.2: Instant participant overview for each time slot
list.3: Filter by specific participants or group size

1.title: Choose your preferred dates
1.description: Start by selecting the dates and times you'd like to meet with your group and create an event.

2.title: Mark your availability
2.description: Fill out your available times for the selected dates. This will be visible to other participants.

3.title: Find the perfect time
3.description: Share the event link with your group. As others fill out their availability, you'll see everyone's schedules overlaid, making it easy to find the best time that works for everyone.

callToAction.message: No registration or login required - Start scheduling now!
